title: Free Thursday Night Hangs: Boomerang
description:
AGES 13–18

Free Thursday Night Hangs premieres in January with a live performance by Boomerang.


5:00–6:00 GET COMFORTABLE
Free hot chocolate bar and an open stage.
Like an open mic, guests are invited to
perform some form of creative dance or movement.
We are keeping it fun and casual—in-progress work welcome.

6:00–7:00 PERFORMANCE
Enjoy a one-hour dance performance by Boomerang in Griffin Court.

7:00–8:00 MEET THE ARTISTS
Stay after to hangout with and get to know members of Boomerang.

 Find more information and RSVP.

To request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program, please call (312) 443-3680 or send an e-mail to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible.

Please see the museum’s Accessibility page for more information.
